channel.title: VisionX 724 | Perfect Pking | Need staff | Current staff are GREAT!
channel.description:
[url=http://visionx.enjin.com]VISIONX 724[/url] Welcome to VisionX, a new server. Soon to be 24/7, we are currently hiring staff (only if they are worthy, we do not accept staff hunger players.) This server was created by owner Andy and co-owner Sanjil. I will not give too much information, I do not want you to judge a book by its cover. I encourage players to come and find out themselves. Here is a small video to give a glimpse some of its features. [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ogPrJcoq-I4[/youtube] Some of the Features: Summoning Dungeoneering Chaotics Spirit shields (all effects) Nex armours All Bosses Minigames Custom objects Grand Exchange (G.E) Tokhaar Kal Fire Cape All Special attacks work Comp. cape (completionist/max cape) Great switches modern F-keys (Pking F-Keys) F.O.G shops (fist of guthix token shops) All skills work Donator Zone Yells work for all players Note:The server is not yet 24/7 it will be soon. Server based in the U.k. (Australian times 6:00pm+). Client Download: [url=http://uppit.com/9bfzdd84s76r/VisionX.jar
]HERE[/url] Website/Forums: [url=http://www.visionx.enjin.com]HERE[/url] When you join please note that your referrer was Ggson.

item.description:
@khayam wrote:

ive just opened my own server:
https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,643790.0.html

come check it out custom bosses custom agility course added, hunter minigames, fully reworked gwd with killcounts, great eco, medium xp rates much more come check it out

player mod spot is now open and players are applying

item.title: VisionX 724 | Perfect Pking | Need staff | Current staff are GREAT!
item.dc:creator: @khayam khayam
item.description:
@khayam wrote:

[quote=“ChelseaGrin, post:6, topic:522343”][quote author=ggson link=topic=640850.msg4318475#msg4318475 date=1371863401]
I am not the owner, I am simply Head admin. If you look on the forums, I do not disrespect the members of the VisionX community. I am always active and helping out. If you do not have anything positive or helpful to say, then don’t post. This is just a simple advertisement so the server grows.
[/quote]

Actually I gave a correct assumption, not knowing you were an Admin, isn’t my fault.

And i tried your garbage server, just like most obnoxious server owners, you give away so much, that the ECO is a complete waste…[/quote]

i hat it when admins/owners do giveaways to gain more players n etc it just kills the eco fully… happend so many times on servers that ive played

Read full topic

@ggson wrote:

VISIONX 724
Welcome to VisionX, a new server. Soon to be 24/7, we are currently hiring staff (only if they are worthy, we do not accept staff hunger players.) This server was created by owner Andy and co-owner Sanjil.

I will not give too much information, I do not want you to judge a book by its cover. I encourage players to come and find out themselves. Here is a small video to give a glimpse some of its features.
[youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ogPrJcoq-I4[/youtube]

Some of the Features:
Summoning
Dungeoneering
Chaotics
Spirit shields (all effects)
Nex armours
All Bosses
Minigames
Custom objects
Grand Exchange (G.E)
Tokhaar Kal
Fire Cape
All Special attacks work
Comp. cape (completionist/max cape)
Great switches
modern F-keys (Pking F-Keys)
F.O.G shops (fist of guthix token shops)
All skills work
Donator Zone
Yells work for all players

Note:The server is not yet 24/7 it will be soon. Server based in the U.k. (Australian times 6:00pm+).

Client Download: HERE

When you join please note that your referrer was Ggson.
